page.title: 03GALA DAY - OLD KILPATRICK
page.content:
Continued from page 2. ______________________ There was dancing and singing which was enjoyed by everyone.There were important people in the audience.The Provost of Clydebank{David Grainger,} was there with his wife and this made the evening very special. On{Gala Day}itself, there were stalls selling ices, sweets,books, toys and jewellery.The streets were decorated with flags, ribbons and streamers. Everyone feels happy and excited on {Gala Day,}which is a very special occasion in the year.
---------------
